entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET Maui todo list problem #20123
  • Cascading memory leak when StrokeShape is set on Border control on iOS #20121
  • Page-level memory leak in NavigationPage on iOS #20119
  • [testing] Visual UITests need to be able to handle several devices #20113
    .NET 8 SR3
  • [ci] Failing RunOniOS net7.0 on main #20112
  • [Android] Review and fix failing Issue18751Test #20111
    Backlog
  • [Android] Review and fix failing Issue18896Test #20110
    Backlog
  • [ci] Fix net9 branch builds #20109
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Android: AlertDialog Button can't customize button color #20108
  • [ci] Xharness fails to install application to run Device Tests and UITests #20107
  • Encoding.ASCII is trimmed in Android/iOS in .NET8 #20104
  • Add support for RelativeBindingSource to TypedBinding #20101
  • Compile Error: "The type or namespace name 'MauiUIApplicationDelegate' could not be found" in latest nightly builds #20099
  • iOS-specific Slider.UpdateOnTab doesn't work #20098
  • LinearGradientBrush in global style does not work #20097
  • Page-level memory leak on modal navigation on iOS #20094
  • Android: LineBreakMode="WordWrap" not working when label in popup on a row in a multi-row grid - 8.0.7-nightly.9897 #20092
    .NET 8 SR2
  • MAUI Blazor Hybrid App Fails To Load Certain IFrames #20091
  • dotnet publish -f net8.0-ios -c Release is way too slow #20090

Closed

  • TextArea is not working (Maui Blazor) #11308
  • Windows: Connectivity check sometimes return NetworkAccess.Unknown #17270
    .NET 8 SR2
  • [regression/7.0.0] Connectivity.ConnectivityChanged Event throws exception at network change #15843
    .NET 8 SR2
  • Android Unfocused Entry Behavior only gets called when leaving the page #11881
    Backlog
  • DEP0700 ERROR - Registration of the app failed. App manifest validation error... #19364
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • [ci] Restore tools on provisioned dotnet #20105
    .NET 8 SR2
  • [iOS] Shell tab titles don't truncate and they overlap in iOS unlike Android #20015
  • [ci] Main is broken because it can't find xharness #20103
    .NET 8 SR2
  • maui 8.0 app not run. #19456
  • The theme of the application changes if you open the file picker dialog and hide/open app #20095
  • [Bug] Scroll view scroll x position does not working on horizontal orientation #2777
    Backlog
  • MAUI 6.1.0 Popup page Wordwrap on label stop working #19878
  • Platform specifics are all included in compilation #19876

PullRequests

Created

  • [ci] Update System.Drawing.Common #20122
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [net8.0] Merge main to net8.0 #20117
  • [testing] Revert back to net7.0 #20115
  • PullToRefresh & item selection when listView is not Enabled fix [iOS] #20102
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, area/ListView
  • Fixed entry text color [iOS] #20100
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, community ✨

Merged

  • [WinUI] Add workaround for Connectivity check on Win10 #19261
    platform/windows 🪟, area/essentials 🍞, area/desktop 🖥️, partner/cat 😻
  • Do not use underscores in the ApplicationId #19377
    area/templates 📄, stale
  • [ci] Restore dotnet tools in provisioned sdk #20106
    testing-flakiness, testing-green-ci, xharness, .NET 8 SR2
  • Bump Xamarin.UITest to 4.3.4 #20067
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, testing-legacy-ui-tests
  • Split the InputTransparency tests #19925
    area/testing, testing-flakiness
  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9.0 #20077
  • Add Obsolete tag for old IndexOf #20068

Updated

  • Implemented ios:Slider.UpdateOnTap #20124
    community ✨
  • Translucent and Transparent NavigationBar on iOS #19204
    area/navigation 🧭, platform/iOS 🍎, area/shell 🐢, partner/cat 😻, .NET 8 SR2
  • [X] GetValueSource #19563
    do-not-merge, area/testing
  • [iOS] Figure a better EstimatedItemSize for HorizontalList #20022
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/collectionview 📃
  • Rectify the scopes in the builder #19932
    area/hosting 🧩
  • Enable building WASDK Self-Contained packaged apps #20019
    platform/windows 🪟
  • [Windows] Adjust recycle check in ItemContentControl #20079
    platform/windows 🪟, area/collectionview 📃
  • [Trimming] Fix trimming warnings related to image source service provider #20058
    area/app-size 🤏
  • Add animated GIF support for Image #19411
    area/image :framed_picture:, stale
  • Source Generator Performance Improvements #19990
    area/Xaml </>
  • use MathF where possible #19965
    community ✨
  • Propagate the app theme to all children #19931
    area/Xaml </>, area/perf 🏎️
  • [.NET 9] Reconcile all NET8 //TODO Add this API comments #19996
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/architecture
  • Added ProcessTerminated event to WebView #20059
    t/enhancement ☀️, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • [Android, iOS, Windows] Correctly scale Button image #19834
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • [iOS] Fix gestures in Label Spans #15544
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, stale, area/gestures
  • [Windows] Fix performance issue using Shadows #18337
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️
  • [Windows] Fix crash using ScrollTo on CollectionView #19921
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/collectionview 📃
  • Hide FlyoutIcon when FlyoutBehavior set to disabled #20087
    community ✨
  • Improve Clamp() performance #20051
    community ✨
  • More IndexOf() optimization #20083
    community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #19848
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
